ValidationRule.description: If Call Status or next action is Visit confirmed, Visit proposed, Meeting confirmed or Meeting Fixed then "Proposed date of visit" has to be made mandatory.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Presales Call'), ISPICKVAL(Call_Status__c, 'Connected'), ISPICKVAL(Call_Disposition_Custom__c, 'Visit Scheduled'), ISBLANK(Call_Proposed_date_of_visit__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Proposed Date of visit is mandatory
